name: Elephants have long trunks
description:
Elephants have long trunks (象は鼻が長い🇯🇵) is a one-stroke drawing puzzle with gravity.

Feed the elephant all red fruits. If the fruit is in a crate, break the crate.

A stretched nose can be crossed, but the same stroke cannot be traced twice.

10 levels.

WASD/Arrow to move. Z to undo. R to restart.

Made in 48h for the Thinky Puzzle Game Jam.

[hack] https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=aec009ac2b2ecbd96ddc61570b4135b3

[Solutions (Spoiler)] Screenshots in my blog!
